name: Dave's Game
description:
Dave's Game is a Spelunky-like procedural generation platformer. Collect gold as you venture further down into the caves. How deep can you go?

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

Dave's Game was created for our final year dissertation module. This module gives students the ability to research and create a project in their desired specialism. The focus of this dissertation project was on procedural generation.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • S to move camera down

REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows PC
  • Keyboard and Mouse

TEAM MEMBERS

  • 1 x Level 6 Student

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.

Information on the BSc Games Development course at University of Chester can be found here. 

Twitter: @UoCGamesDev
